entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: The Game of Life 2
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö$34.99 ‚Üí $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $34.99]

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Doodle Baseball Game
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you‚Äôre a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport‚Äîand more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter‚Äôs box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball‚Äîthe ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB-style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: TuneShift
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Revitalize your Apple Music library! TuneShift intelligently matches your cherished music from NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music to Apple Music platform. Say goodbye to tedious manual searching. With just a few simple steps, rediscover your complete music collection on Apple Music. Our smart engine ensures you find the closest matches to your original favorites. Core Advantages: ‚Ä¢ Premium music matching engine for precise track identification ‚Ä¢ Preserve complete collection structure and playback order ‚Ä¢ Real-time progress display ‚Ä¢ Minimalist design with one-click operation Privacy Protection: We prioritize user privacy, strictly adhering to privacy protocols to ensure your account information remains secure. Why Choose TuneShift: Professional music identification technology Superior matching accuracy Swift processing efficiency User-friendly interface Let TuneShift be your professional music management tool for the perfect Apple Music experience!

entry.title: Evoland 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.49 [$1.49 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

What were your childhood games like? Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references. From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you‚Äôll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored. ‚ÄúEvoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder‚Äù is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology. Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we‚Äôre proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices. ¬´ It‚Äôs a mashup on a grand scale ‚Äî and a successful one ‚Äî bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. ¬ª - 9/10 GamesBeat ‚ÄúEvoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.‚Äù 4/5 ‚Äì Hardcoregamer Compatible with MFI controllers. If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Evoland
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.59 [$0.59 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Evoland is an action adventure game that takes you on a journey through the history of classic adventure and RPG gaming. As you progress through the game, you unlock new technologies, gameplay systems and ever-improving graphics. From monochrome to full 3D graphics and from turn-based battles to real-time boss fights, Evoland makes you live the evolution of adventure gaming ‚Äì all with plenty of humour and nods to moments from classic games. - Play through the history of action-adventure video games - Discover many evolutions, from old school 2D action/adventure to active time battles and full 3D action - Revisit the starting area rendered in full 3D or explore the overworld with your own airship! - And have fun with the dungeons, puzzles, a heap of secrets to uncover, and hundreds of achievements and stars to collect Check out the official website at evoland.shirogames.com Follow us on Twitter @playdigious Like us on Facebook /playdigious If you experience any problem with Evoland, please contact our customer support team at playdigious@gmail.com. Don't forget to specify which device and operating system you are using. Supported languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Chinese, Korean, Japanese

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MovieSpirit - Movie Maker Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Pay once, use foreverÔºÅ You are free to use and upgrade the App in your whole life once you pay for the download once. Do you want to share your exciting and memorable moments with someone? Do you want to make your own movie? Do you want to be a director, a producer, a starring actor? In MovieSpirit, these characters can all be done by you alone! With MovieSpirit, you can combine various media materials, such as videos, photos, music, text, recording and finger graffiti, and according to your creativity, edit them together and add various special effects (scene switching effects, Text animation, Filter effects, video Intro, masks and so on) to create your own movie. Main functions: - Crop, split, merge, cut, transform, flip and scale media clips - Overlay multi-layers video (Picture-in-picture effect), no limit to the number of videos or pictures - Professional Video Ratio, Scalable Timeline (frame by frame), Unlimited Track Layers - Add masks (Line mask, Rectangle mask, Circle mask, Text mask and Path mask options) to hide or show parts of the video - Video matting, remove video background - Cutout Tool (Custom Shape Tools such as Pen Tool, Lasso Tool, Smudge Tool and Text Tool can be used for image matting) - Replace background for green/blue screen video, chroma key compositing - up to 50 special effects options, such as Blur, Snow, Rain, Bubble, Flower, Earthquake, Mirror, Fireworks, Smoke, Vortex, flame, Starry Sky and so on - Gradual Opaque - Fast-Forward, Slow-Motion and reverse video (1/12 Slow to 16-fold Speed) - Text-to-Voice function (dozens of language options) - 360 Degrees rotating video - Multiple Image Blending modes - Various fonts, text templates, text colors, vertical text, emojis, shadows, text strokes, alignment etc., supports downloading new fonts from Internet or icloud - Built-in free music and sound effects in various styles, adding music from your computer or from iTunes, and extracting audio from videos - Voice recording - Draw graffiti with your finger directly on the film, variety of auxiliary drawing shape tools that can be freely selected such as straight line, curve, arrow, circle, square, triangle, star, heart, colorful text and so on - Simple automatic tracking function - Add movable mosaic - Custom Background Color, such as solid color, gradient color and extract color from picture - Dozens of Animation effects - Adjustable Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, Exposure, White Balance, Gamma - Create your own GIF animation - Private Custom Intro titles (sold separately) - Up to 80 filter effects (sketch, comics, fisheye, magnifiers, glass, background blur, rotation blur, vortex, various color filter and so on - Up to 60 scene switching effects - dozens of appearance shapes can be set for video/picture such as circle, heart, diamond, star, various irregular shapes and even customize unique shapes - Can turn the video/photo into black and white, highlight the part that needs to be highlighted (Color Splash) - Free to deform video/photo into irregular shapes - Add motion points to video/photo/text to make them move, zoom, rotate and move together to create a variety of gorgeous effects, such as fade-in and fade-out effect and up to 100 multiple phantom effect - Real-time preview, high resolution video output (HD) - Import multimedia material directly from your computer via Wi-Fi: videos, photos, music and GIF animations - Save and share videos directly to social networks such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, iCloud, WeChat, Mailbox and so on - Helpful video tutorials We're looking forward to any feedback and comments on MovieSpirit, and if you have any query or problem, please feel free to contact us via email verytools2006@gmail.com We are committed to your long-term satisfaction. Thanks!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: ChatTan - AI Bot
entry.content:

"Á¥´ÁôΩÈ£õÊòüËê¨Âπ¥ÊõÜ - ÂçÅ‰∏âË°å‰ΩúÂìÅ" ÁÇ∫ÁéÑÂ≠∏ÊÑõÂ•ΩËÄÖËàáÂ∞àÊ•≠‰∫∫Â£´Ë®≠Ë®àÔºåÊèê‰æõË©≥Á¥∞ÁöÑÁ¥´ÁôΩÈ£õÊòüË≥áÊñôÂíåË±êÂØåÁöÑÂÇ≥Áµ±‰∏≠ÂúãÊõÜÊ≥ïË≥áË®ä„ÄÇÊñ∞ÁâàÂ¢ûÂº∑‰∫ÜÂÖ¨ÁúæÂÅáÊúüÈ°ØÁ§∫„ÄÅÊõ∏Á∞ΩÂäüËÉΩÔºåÊèê‰æõÊõ¥Âä†Á≤æÊ∫ñÁöÑÈ¢®Ê∞¥‰ΩàÂ±Ä„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ Á¥´ÁôΩÈ£õÊòüË≥áË®äÔºöË©≥Á¥∞ÂàóÂá∫Âπ¥„ÄÅÊúà„ÄÅÊó•„ÄÅÊôÇÁöÑÁ¥´ÁôΩÈ£õÊòü„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ Áî∑Â•≥ÂëΩÂç¶ÔºöÊèê‰æõÁî∑Â•≥ÂëΩÂç¶Ë≥áË®äÔºåÊèêÂçáÈ¢®Ê∞¥‰ΩàÂ±ÄÊ∫ñÁ¢∫ÊÄß„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ Êõ∏Á∞ΩÂäüËÉΩÔºöÂÖÅË®±Â∞áÂ§öÂÄãÊó•ÊúüÂä†ÂÖ•Êõ∏Á∞ΩÔºåÊñπ‰æøÊØîËºÉÂíåÊü•Áúã„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ È°ØÁ§∫ÊâÄÈÅ∏Êó•ÊúüÁöÑÂõõÊü±ÔºöÂåÖÊã¨Âπ¥„ÄÅÊúà„ÄÅÊó•„ÄÅÊôÇÂπ≤ÊîØÔºåÊîØÊè¥Êó©Â§úÂ≠êË®≠ÂÆö„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ ÁØÄÊ∞£ËÆäÂåñÊòéÁ¥∞È°ØÁ§∫ÔºöË©≥Á¥∞ÂàóÂá∫ÁØÄÊ∞£ÂâçÂæåÁ¥´ÁôΩÈ£õÊòüÁöÑËÆäÂåñÔºåÂπ´Âä©Áî®Êà∂Êõ¥Ê∫ñÁ¢∫Âú∞ÈÄ≤Ë°åÂÆâÊéíÂíåÊ±∫Á≠ñ„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ Áï∂ÊúàÁØÄÊ∞£ÊôÇÈñìÈ°ØÁ§∫ÔºöÊ∏ÖÊô∞Â±ïÁ§∫ÈáçË¶ÅÁöÑÁØÄÊ∞£ËÆäÂåñ„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ ÂÖ¨ÁúæÂÅáÊúüÈ°ØÁ§∫ÔºöÊîØÊåÅ‰∏≠Âúã„ÄÅÈ¶ôÊ∏Ø„ÄÅÂè∞ÁÅ£„ÄÅÊñ∞Âä†Âù°ÁöÑÂÖ¨ÁúæÂÅáÊúüË≥áË®äÔºåÂπ´Âä©ÊÇ®Êõ¥ÊúâÊïàÈÅ∏ÊìáÂêâÊó•„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ Ë•øÊõÜÂèäËæ≤ÊõÜÊó•ÊúüÊêúÂ∞ãÂèäËΩâÊèõÂäüËÉΩÔºöÊîØÊåÅ1850Ëá≥2150Âπ¥ÈñìÁöÑË•øÊõÜËàáËæ≤ÊõÜËΩâÊèõ„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ Â§öË™ûË®Ä‰ªãÈù¢ÔºöÊèê‰æõÁπÅÈ´î‰∏≠ÊñáÂíåÁ∞°È´î‰∏≠ÊñáÈÅ∏È†Ö„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ Ë®≠ÂÆöÔºöÂåó(Âùé)ÊñπÂêë„ÄÅÈ£õÊòüÈ°èËâ≤„ÄÅÊéíÂàóÊñπÂºèÁöÑË®≠ÂÆöÈÅ∏È†Ö„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ Êó•ÊúüÂõõÊü±ÁÆóÊ≥ïÔºöÂèØË®≠ÂÆöÊó©Â§úÂ≠ê„ÄÇ ‚Ä¢ Êó•È£õÊòüË®àÁÆóÊ≥ï‰æùÊìöÂÇ≥Áµ±Ê≠åË®£: Êó•ÂÆ∂Á¥´ÁôΩ‰∏çÈõ£Ê±ÇÔºå‰∫åÂçÅÂõõÊ∞£ÂÖ≠ÂÆÆÂë®ÔºåÂÜ¨Ëá≥ÈôΩÁîüÂâçÂæåÁØÄÔºåÈ†ÜË°åÁî≤Â≠ê‰∏ÄÂÆÆÁßªÔºå Èõ®Ê∞¥‰æøÂæû‰∏ÉÂÆÆËµ∑ÔºåË∞∑Èõ®ÈÇÑÂæûÂõõÁ∂†Êé®ÔºåÈô∞ÁîüÂ§èËá≥‰πùÂÆÆÈÄÜÔºåËôïÊöëÂâçÂæå‰∏âÁ¢ßÊòØÔºå ÈúúÈôçÂÖ≠ÂÆÆËµ∑Áî≤Â≠êÔºåÈ†ÜÈÄÜÂàÜÊòéÂçÅ‰∫åÊîØÔºåÊúâÊòØ‰ΩïÊòüÁï∂ÂÄºÊó•ÔºåÁßªÂÖ•‰∏≠ÂÆÆÈ†ÜÈÄÜÈ£õ„ÄÇ Ê≠°ËøéÊèê‰æõÊÑèË¶ãÂèØ Email Âà∞ hello@firm13.com ÊàñÂú® App Store ÁïôË®Ä„ÄÇ

entry.title: The Game of Life 2
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö$34.99 ‚Üí $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $34.99]

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST V
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$14.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $14.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

******************** This grand adventure, unfolding over three generations, is now available to play in the palm of your hand! Take your place among a family of heroes, sharing in all the triumphs and tragedies of their storied lives! Enjoy three generations‚Äô worth of adventure in one standalone package! There will be a fee to download the game but download it once, and there‚Äôs nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download! *In-game text is available in English only. ******************** ‚óÜPrologue Our hero begins the story as a small boy, travelling the world with his father, Pankraz. Over the course of his many adventures, this lovable lad learns and grows. And when he finally becomes a man, he resolves to continue his father‚Äôs unfinished quest‚Äîto find the Legendary Hero... This thrilling tale on a stunning scale can now be enjoyed on pocket-sized devices! ‚óÜGame Feature „ÉªMake Friends with Mighty Monsters! The fearsome monsters you face in battle can now become your friends, giving you access to unique spells and abilities‚Äîand a whole host of strategic possibilities! „ÉªConverse Freely with your Fellow Party Members! The party chat function allows you to converse freely with the cast of colourful characters who will accompany you on your adventure. So don‚Äôt hesitate to turn to them for advice and idle chit-chat whenever the urge assails you! „Éª360-Degree Views Rotate your viewpoint in towns and villages through a full 360 degrees to make sure you don‚Äôt miss a thing! „ÉªAI Battles Tired of giving orders? Your faithful companions can be instructed to fight automatically! Use the various tactics at your disposal to see off even the toughest enemies with ease! „ÉªThe Casino With slot machines, poker, the monster arena and the exciting slime races of the slurpodrome, the casino is sure to provide you with a little light relief when the pressures of adventuring prove too great. Better still, you can exchange the tokens you earn for all kinds of exciting items, making taking a break well worth your while! „ÉªTreasures ‚Äòn‚Äô Trapdoors Take dice in hand and roll your way around specially designed game boards, enjoying a whole range of exciting events as you go! Some of the things you‚Äôll see won‚Äôt be available anywhere else, and if you manage to make it to the end, you can win some really great rewards! „ÉªBruise the Ooze is Back! Bruise the Ooze, the slime-smashing minigame introduced in the Nintendo DS version, is back with a bang! Tap the slimes within the time limit to earn points in this super-simple yet fiendishly addictive goo-splatting extravaganza! „ÉªSimple, Intuitive Controls The game‚Äôs controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play. „ÉªExperience the legendary RPG loved by millions in Japan and worldwide! Created by a legendary trio with the master creator Yuji Horii, the revolutionary synthesizer score and orchestration by Koichi Sugiyama, and art by master manga artist Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball). -------------------- [Supported Operating Systems] iOS11.0 and above. [Supported Devices] iPhone 5S/iPod touch (6th Generation)/iPad (5th Generation) and above.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

******************** The game that started the legend of DRAGON QUEST is here at last for mobile devices! Discover the RPG that won the hearts of two generations! Enter a fantasy world of sword, magic, and monsters in one standalone package! Download it once, and there‚Äôs nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download! ******************** ‚óÜ Prologue The peace of fair Alefgard has been shattered by the appearance of the nefarious master of the night known as the Dragonlord, and the Sphere of Light which for so long kept the forces of darkness in check has been stolen! It‚Äôs time for you, a young warrior through whose veins flows the blood of the legendary hero Erdrick, to set out on a quest to vanquish the Dragonlord, and save the land from darkness! ‚óÜ Game Features „ÉªFirst in the Legendary Series Originally released as Dragon Warrior, you can now experience the classic retro RPG experience that swept up millions of Japanese players back in the Eighties...and never let go! Become the descendant of the legendary hero Erdrick, and embark on an epic journey through the historic realm of Alefgard, tackling fearsome foes and perplexing puzzles on your way to the dread Dragonlord‚Äôs lair! „ÉªSimple, Intuitive Controls The game‚Äôs controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play. „ÉªExperience the legendary RPG loved by millions in Japan and worldwide! Created by a legendary trio with the master creator Yuji Horii, the revolutionary synthesizer score and orchestration by Koichi Sugiyama, and art by master manga artist Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball). -------------------- ‚óÜ Supported iOS Devices/Operating Systems ‚óÜ „ÉªiPhone 4 and Above/iPad/iPod touch (4th Generation and Above) „ÉªiOS5.1.1 and Above

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST II
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

The second instalment in the celebrated Dragon Quest series finally comes to mobile! Explore fair lands and foul dungeons in this all-time classic RPG! Every wondrous weapon, spectacular spell and awesome adversary in this rich fantasy world is yours to discover in a single standalone package. Download it once, and there‚Äôs nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download! ‚ÄªIn-game text is available in English only. ‚óÜ Prologue A century has passed since the events of DRAGON QUEST, during which time three new nations have been founded by the offspring of the great hero of Alefgard. But the peace they have long enjoyed is no more. Demon hosts summoned forth from the darkness by the fallen High Priest Hargon have brought the land to the brink of ruin once again. Now, the young prince of Midenhall‚Äîa descendant of the legendary warrior Erdrick‚Äîmust set out to find the two other heirs to the heroic bloodline so that together they might defeat the nefarious Hargon and restore peace to their world. ‚óÜ Game Features „ÉªWhether you‚Äôre keen to pick up where the first part of the Erdrick Trilogy left off, or are entirely new to the series, DRAGON QUEST II: Luminaries of the Legendary Line is sure to take you on an unforgettable journey. „ÉªIn this early example of an open-world adventure, players are free to wander the wilds, brave monster-infested dungeons, or take to the seas in search of new lands‚Äîdiscovering ever more powerful abilities and valuable treasures along the way! „ÉªSimple, Intuitive Controls The game‚Äôs controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play. „ÉªExperience the multi-million selling series, beloved both in Japan and beyond, and see how the masterful talents of series creator Yuji Horii first combined with the revolutionary synthesizer sounds of Koichi Sugiyama and the wildly popular manga illustrations of Akira Toriyama to create a gaming sensation. ‚óÜ Supported iOS Devices/Operating Systems ‚óÜ „ÉªiPhone 4 and above/iPad/iPod touch (4th generation and above) „ÉªiOS4.3 and above

Application Screenshot

entry.title: Backyard Baseball '97
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez! Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master! Game Modes: Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately. Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters. Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)! Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you‚Äôll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball! T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field! BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules: No leading off No Injuries Bunting is allowed Tagging up is allowed Stealing is allowed At our core, we are fans first‚Äìnot just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.
